This `.gitignore` is simple and generalâ€‘purpose.  
It assumes that the repository is mainly Markdown, but accommodates some common scenarios (like adding scripts or build tooling later).

# .gitignore

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Editor swap/backup files
*.swp
*.swo
*~
*.bak

# Node/npm (if you later add build tools)
node_modules/
dist/

# Python (if you later add scripts)
__pycache__/
*.pyc

# Temporary files
*.log
*.tmp

# VSCode settings
.vscode/

# Build output
/build/
/out/

# Archives
*.zip
*.tar.gz
*.tgz
